thread.section_title: Elevate Styles Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Elevate Styles | elevatestyles.com
thread.title: Cat

author: Cat
title: Cat
text: This was my first time ordering from this company and I must say I was impressed with how quickly my items were shipped!!! I was very pleased with the shipping and delivery speed, my items were shipped the day after I ordered it. My only complaint so far is that my hair packages were folded so that it could be stuffs in the box. But I would definitely use this site again in the future!
